Russian (RU): Канон‐кун был единственным годившимся ей в парни на этом острове. Так что, судя по её реакции, я попал в цель.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O Kanon‐kun é o único garoto nesta ilha agora que poderia se tornar seu namorado. Então, julgando pela reação dela, eu provavelmente estou certo.
Vietnamese (VI): Kanon‐kun is the only boy on this island now who could possibly become her boyfriend. So judging by her reaction, I'm probably right on.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此刻，在這個島上的男人中，能與朱志香發展成一對的就只有嘉音君。並且從這反應來看，應該是說中了吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此刻，在这个岛上的男人中，能与朱志香发展成一对的就只有嘉音君。并且从这反应来看，应该是说中了吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Kanon‐kun is the only boy on this island now who could possibly become her boyfriend. So judging by her reaction, I'm probably right on.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kanon-kun era il solo su quest'isola che sarebbe potuto diventare il suo ragazzo. Perciò, giudicando dalla sua reazione, avevo indovinato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Kanon‐kun is the only boy on this island now who could possibly become her boyfriend. So judging by her reaction, I'm probably right on.
Turkish (TR): Kanon-kun şu anda bu adada onun erkek arkadaşı olabilecek tek erkek. Yani tepkisine bakılırsa, muhtemelen haklıyım.

Steam (ST): I didn't think of the Ushiromiya family as a noble family, ...but love with a servant... I wouldn't have dreamed that two pairs of Romeo and Juliet would be right next to me...
Umineko Project (UP): I don't think of the Ushiromiya family as a noble family, but...two people in love with servants... I'd never have dreamed that two pairs of Romeo and Juliet would be right next to me...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I didn't think of the Ushiromiya family as a noble family, ...but love with a servant... I wouldn't have dreamed that two pairs of Romeo and Juliet would be right next to me...
PC Japanese (JP): 右代宮家を高貴な一族だなんて思っちゃいないが、…使用人との恋が二人か。ロミオとジュリエットが身近に二組もいるなんて夢にも思わなかったぜ…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 右代宮家を高貴な一族だなんて思っちゃいないが、…使用人との恋が二人か。ロミオとジュリエットが身近に二組もいるなんて夢にも思わなかったぜ…。
Russian (RU): Я не воспринимал семью Уширомия как семью благородных кровей... Но любовь с прислугой... Я и представить себе не мог, что практически рядом со мной будут находится две пары аля Ромео и Джульетта...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não penso na família Ushiromiya como uma família nobre, mas...duas pessoas apaixonadas por serviçais... Eu nunca sonhei que dois pares de Romeu e Julieta estariam tão próximos de mim...
Vietnamese (VI): I don't think of the Ushiromiya family as a noble family, but...two people in love with servants... I'd never have dreamed that two pairs of Romeo and Juliet would be right next to me...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我從沒把右代宮家當成是什麼高貴的家族，…不過，提起愛上傭人的兩人麼。倒真是做夢都沒有想到，身邊竟會有兩對“羅密歐與朱麗葉”…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我从没把右代宫家当成是什么高贵的家族，…不过，提起爱上佣人的两人么。倒真是做梦都没有想到，身边竟会有两对“罗密欧与朱丽叶”…。
Indonesian (IDN): I don't think of the Ushiromiya family as a noble family, but...two people in love with servants... I'd never have dreamed that two pairs of Romeo and Juliet would be right next to me...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non pensavo agli Ushiromiya come una famiglia nobile... ma l'amore verso un domestico... non avrei mai pensato di avere accanto a me due coppie come Romeo e Giulietta...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): I don't think of the Ushiromiya family as a noble family, but...two people in love with servants... I'd never have dreamed that two pairs of Romeo and Juliet would be right next to me...
Turkish (TR): Ushiromiya ailesini pek de soylu bir aile olarak görmüyorum ama...hizmetkârlara aşık iki insan... İki çift Romeo ve Juliet'in hemen yanımda olacağını asla tahmin edemezdim...

Steam (ST): Aunt Eva would probably become an obstacle to George-aniki and Shannon-chan's love.
Umineko Project (UP): Auntie Eva will probably become an obstacle to George‐aniki and Shannon‐chan's love.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eva oba-san would probably become an obstacle to George-aniki and Shannon-chan's love.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治の兄貴と紗音ちゃんの恋路は、……絵羽伯母さんが障害になるだろうな。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 譲治の兄貴と紗音ちゃんの恋路は、……絵羽伯母さんが障害になるだろうな。
Russian (RU): Тётя Ева однозначно будет глубоко против любви Джорджа‐аники и Шаннон‐чан.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A tia Eva provavelmente vai se tornar um obstáculo para o amor do George‐aniki e da Shannon‐chan.
Vietnamese (VI): Auntie Eva will probably become an obstacle to George‐aniki and Shannon‐chan's love.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在讓治大哥和紗音的戀途上，……繪羽姑母會成為一道坎吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在让治大哥和纱音的恋途上，……绘羽姑母会成为一道坎吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Auntie Eva will probably become an obstacle to George‐aniki and Shannon‐chan's love.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eva oba-san probabilmente sarebbe un ostacolo per l'amore fra George-aniki e Shannon-chan.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Auntie Eva will probably become an obstacle to George‐aniki and Shannon‐chan's love.
Turkish (TR): Eva Teyze muhtemelen George-aniki ve Shannon-chan'ın aşkına bir engel olacak.

Steam (ST): If Aunt Eva ever learned that Shannon-chan was the partner of her only beloved son, she'd probably scream at her for trying to steal away her precious George.
Umineko Project (UP): If Auntie Eva learns that the partner of her only son, the apple of her eye, is {i:Shannon‐chan}, she'll probably scream at her with cries of wretched servant, homewrecker, and so forth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If Eva oba-san learned that the partner of her only beloved son was Shannon-chan, she would probably scream at her, as though a servant was the same as a cat who had snuck in.
PC Japanese (JP): あの絵羽伯母さんに限って、眼に入れても痛くないひとり息子のお相手が紗音ちゃんだと知ったら、この使用人風情がー、泥棒猫ーと絶叫するだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): あの絵羽伯母さんに限って、眼に入れても痛くないひとり息子のお相手が紗音ちゃんだと知ったら、この使用人風情がー、泥棒猫ーと絶叫するだろう。
Russian (RU): Если бы тётя Ева прознала, что девушкой её ненаглядного сына является {i:Шаннон‐чан}, она наверняка бы заорала на неё, словно служанка была всё равно что закравшася вороватая кошка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se a tia Eva descobrir que a parceira de seu único e amado filho é a {nobr:Shannon‐chan}, ela provavelmente vai gritar com ela chamando-a de serviçal miserável, destruidora de lares, e assim por diante.
Vietnamese (VI): If Auntie Eva learns that the partner of her only son, the apple of her eye, is {i:Shannon‐chan}, she'll probably scream at her with cries of wretched servant, homewrecker, and so forth.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 僅就繪羽姑母來說，若是知道自己視為心肝寶貝的獨子的戀人是紗音，一定會大叫“你個區區下人——”“你個狐狸精——”吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 仅就绘羽姑母来说，若是知道自己视为心肝宝贝的独子的恋人是纱音，一定会大叫“你个区区下人——”“你个狐狸精——”吧。
Indonesian (IDN): If Auntie Eva learns that the partner of her only son, the apple of her eye, is {i:Shannon‐chan}, she'll probably scream at her with cries of wretched servant, homewrecker, and so forth.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se venisse a sapere che la compagna del suo amato unico figlio è Shannon-chan, probabilmente le griderebbe contro, come se una domestica fosse uguale ad un gatto entrato in casa.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): If Auntie Eva learns that the partner of her only son, the apple of her eye, is {i:Shannon‐chan}, she'll probably scream at her with cries of wretched servant, homewrecker, and so forth.
Turkish (TR): Eğer Eva Teyze, gözbebeği olan tek oğlunun partnerinin {i:Shannon-chan} olduğunu öğrenirse, muhtemelen ona aşağılık hizmetkâr ve yuva yıkıcı gibi hakaretler ile bağıracaktır.

Steam (ST): And a relationship between Jessica and Kanon-kun would probably be just as full of difficulties. Aunt Natsuhi was also very strict about that kind of thing.
Umineko Project (UP): And a relationship between Jessica and Kanon‐kun would probably be just as full of difficulties.{n}Aunt Natsuhi also seemed the type to be strict about that kind of thing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And a relationship between Jessica and Kanon-kun would probably be just as full of difficulties. Natsuhi oba-san was also very strict about that kind of thing.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そして朱志香と嘉音くんの恋路も同じく多難だろう。{n}夏妃伯母さんも、そういうのにかなり厳しそうだ。
Russian (RU): И отношения между Джессикой и Каноном‐куном, как пить дать, будут полны трудностей.{n}У тёти Нацухи тоже очень строго с этим делом.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 而朱志香和嘉音君的恋途也会同样多灾多难。{n}夏妃伯母看似也对这方面管得很严。
Indonesian (IDN): And a relationship between Jessica and Kanon‐kun would probably be just as full of difficulties.{n}Aunt Natsuhi also seemed the type to be strict about that kind of thing.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E una relazione fra Jessica e Kanon-kun probabilmente sarebbe ugualmente piena di complicazioni. Anche Natsuhi oba-san era molto severa su quel genere di cose.

Steam (ST): ...After all, Jessica's husband would probably become the Head of the Ushiromiya family in the future. If that person had once been a servant working for the family...well, things would get complicated.
Umineko Project (UP): ......After all, Jessica's husband would probably become the head of the Ushiromiya family in the future. If that person had once been a servant working for the family, ......well, no doubt things would be complicated.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Anyway, Jessica's husband would probably become the head of the Ushiromiya family in the future. If that person had once been a servant working for the family, ......well, things would get complicated.
PC Japanese (JP): ……何しろ朱志香の旦那は、未来の右代宮家当主になるんだろうからな。それが、自分たちに仕えてた元使用人ってことになったら、……まぁその、複雑に違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……何しろ朱志香の旦那は、未来の右代宮家当主になるんだろうからな。それが、自分たちに仕えてた元使用人ってことになったら、……まぁその、複雑に違いない。
Russian (RU): ......В любом случае, муж Джессики в будущем станет главой семьёй Уширомия. Если этот человек когда‐то был прислугой, работавшей на семью... В общем, будет сложно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Afinal, o marido da Jessica provavelmente se tornaria o chefe da família Ushiromiya no futuro. Se essa pessoa já tiver trabalhado para a família, ......bem, não há dúvida de que se tornaria complicado.
Vietnamese (VI): ......After all, Jessica's husband would probably become the head of the Ushiromiya family in the future. If that person had once been a servant working for the family, ......well, no doubt things would be complicated.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……畢竟朱志香的丈夫，會成為未來的右代宮家當主啊。這要是讓曾經服侍自己的前傭人當上了，……倒是肯定會心情複雜啊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……毕竟朱志香的丈夫，会成为未来的右代宫家当主啊。这要是让曾经服侍自己的前佣人当上了，……倒是肯定会心情复杂啊。
Indonesian (IDN): ......After all, Jessica's husband would probably become the head of the Ushiromiya family in the future. If that person had once been a servant working for the family, ......well, no doubt things would be complicated.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Comunque, il marito di Jessica probabilmente diventerà in futuro il capo della famiglia Ushiromiya. Se quella persona fosse un domestico che una volta lavorava per la famiglia... beh, le cose si complicherebbero.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): ......After all, Jessica's husband would probably become the head of the Ushiromiya family in the future. If that person had once been a servant working for the family, ......well, no doubt things would be complicated.
Turkish (TR): ......Ne de olsa Jessica'nın kocası muhtemelen gelecekte Ushiromiya ailesinin reisi olacak. Eğer bu kişi bir zamanlar aile için çalışan bir hizmetkâr olsaydı, ......yani, hiç şüphesiz işler çok karışırdı.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "Well, love is different for every person. As long as you're with someone who's fun to be around, does anything else matter?
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, everyone finds their own way in love. Who cares, as long as you find someone you enjoy being with?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Well, who you love depends on the person. Isn't everything fine as long as it's someone who's fun to be with?
PC Japanese (JP): 「ま、人の恋路なんてそれぞれさ。一緒にいて楽しい相手とつがいになりゃいいじゃねぇか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ま、人の恋路なんてそれぞれさ。一緒にいて楽しい相手とつがいになりゃいいじゃねぇか」
Russian (RU): "Ну, кого любить — это зависит от человека. Чего париться, если тебе по‐настоящему весело и хорошо с кем‐то?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem, todos encontram a sua própria forma de amar. Quem se importa, contanto que você encontre alguém que goste e que esteja ao seu lado?"
Vietnamese (VI): "Well, everyone finds their own way in love. Who cares, as long as you find someone you enjoy being with?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不過，談戀愛這事，每個人各不相同。與在一起時很開心的對象結為情侶，不是挺好的嘛。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不过，谈恋爱这事，每个人各不相同。与在一起时很开心的对象结为情侣，不是挺好的嘛。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Well, everyone finds their own way in love. Who cares, as long as you find someone you enjoy being with?"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Beh, chi si ama dipende da persona a persona. Non è tutto a posto finché si tratta di qualcuno con cui ci si diverte?
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Well, everyone finds their own way in love. Who cares, as long as you find someone you enjoy being with?"
Turkish (TR): "Eh, aşkta herkes kendi yolunu bulur. Birlikte olmaktan keyif aldığınız birini bulduğunuz sürece kimin umrunda?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): When two people pair up, they don't need anyone's permission, as long as they accept each other. Worrying about what your parents or family will say means you've already lost. Don't forget that. You'd better not go out with someone with mixed feelings."
Umineko Project (UP): "Being with someone doesn't require any permission as long as the two people accept each other. If you worry about your parents or your family, then you lose. Don't forget that. You can't go out with someone with half‐hearted feelings."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Being with someone doesn't require any permission as long as the two people accept each other. If you worry about your parents or your family, then you lose. Don't forget that. You can't go out with someone with incomplete feelings."
PC Japanese (JP): つがいってのは、互いが互いを認め合う以外に何の許可も要りやしない。親がどうこう、家がどうこうなんて気にしたら負けだぜ。それを忘れるなよ。半端な気持ちで付き合うんじゃねぇぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「つがいってのは、互いが互いを認め合う以外に何の許可も要りやしない。親がどうこう、家がどうこうなんて気にしたら負けだぜ。それを忘れるなよ。半端な気持ちで付き合うんじゃねぇぜ」
Russian (RU): "Если два человека принимают друг друга, то им не требуется чьё‐то разрешение, чтобы быть вместе. Будешь беспокоиться по поводу своих родителей и семьи — проиграешь. Не следует забывать об этом. Нельзя встречаться с кем‐то, если ваши чувства не искренни полностью."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ficar com outra pessoa não requer nenhuma permissão desde que ambos aceitem um ao outro. Se você se preocupar com seus pais ou família, você perde. Não se esqueça disso. Você não pode sair com outra pessoa se tiver sentimentos hesitantes."
Vietnamese (VI): "Being with someone doesn't require any permission as long as the two people accept each other. If you worry about your parents or your family, then you lose. Don't forget that. You can't go out with someone with half‐hearted feelings."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「所謂情侶啊，就是除了雙方間的相互認可外，不再需要其他任何的許可。若是在意父母會怎樣家裡會怎樣什麼的，那就輸了。不要忘了這點喲。可別以半吊子的心態來與人談戀愛哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「所谓情侣啊，就是除了双方间的相互认可外，不再需要其他任何的许可。若是在意父母会怎样家里会怎样什么的，那就输了。不要忘了这点哟。可别以半吊子的心态来与人谈恋爱哦。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Being with someone doesn't require any permission as long as the two people accept each other. If you worry about your parents or your family, then you lose. Don't forget that. You can't go out with someone with half‐hearted feelings."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per stare assieme a qualcuno non serve alcun permesso finché le due persone si accettano l'un l'altra. Se ti preoccupi dei tuoi genitori o della tua famiglia, allora hai perso. Non dimenticare. Non puoi uscire con qualcuno se hai dei sentimenti incompleti."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Being with someone doesn't require any permission as long as the two people accept each other. If you worry about your parents or your family, then you lose. Don't forget that. You can't go out with someone with half‐hearted feelings."
Turkish (TR): "Biriyle birlikte olmak, iki kişi birbirini kabul ettiği sürece herhangi bir izin gerektirmez. Eğer aileniz ya da anne babanız için endişeleniyorsanız, kaybeden siz olursunuz. Bunu unutmayın. Yarım yamalak duygularla biriyle beraber olamazsın."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "...Tch... I can't believe you're saying something so philosophical-sounding when you haven't even been in love."
Umineko Project (UP): "...Heh... I can't believe you're saying something so philosophical‐sounding when you've never ever been in love."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Heh... I can't believe you're saying something so philosophical-sounding when you haven't even been in love."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…ちぇ…。恋もしたことねぇくせに、達観したようなことを言いやがって。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…ちぇ…。恋もしたことねぇくせに、達観したようなことを言いやがって」
Russian (RU): "...Хе... Просто не верится, что ты высказал нечто столь философское, не будучи ни разу влюблённым."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Tch... Eu não consigo acreditar que está dizendo algo tão filosófico quando você sequer se apaixonou alguma vez."
Vietnamese (VI): "...Heh... I can't believe you're saying something so philosophical‐sounding when you've never ever been in love."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…切…。明明沒談過戀愛，卻講出了些看起來很達觀的話。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…切…。明明没谈过恋爱，却讲出了些看起来很达观的话。」
Indonesian (IDN): "...Heh... I can't believe you're saying something so philosophical‐sounding when you've never ever been in love."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Heh... non riesco a credere che tu stia dicendo qualcosa che suona così filosofico quando non ti sei mai neanche innamorato."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Heh... I can't believe you're saying something so philosophical‐sounding when you've never ever been in love."
Turkish (TR): "...Heh... Hiç aşık olmadığın hâlde bu kadar felsefik bir şey söylediğine inanamıyorum."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "Don't treat love like a matter of profit and loss. It's about heart. That's all I have to say. Well then, <see you again, have a nice day>."
Umineko Project (UP): "Don't treat love like a matter of profit and loss. It's about <heart>. That's all I want to say. Well then, <see you again, have a nice day>."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Don't treat love like a matter of profit and loss. It's about heart. That's all I want to say. Well then, <see you again, have a nice day>."
PC Japanese (JP): 「恋は損得勘定でするなよ。ハートでしろよ。俺が言いたいことはそんだけさ。んじゃな、シーユーアゲイン、ハバナイスディ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「恋は損得勘定でするなよ。ハートでしろよ。俺が言いたいことはそんだけさ。んじゃな、シーユーアゲイン、ハバナイスディ」
Russian (RU): "Не относись к любви как к предмету, завязанному на прибыли и убытках. Всё дело в сердце и душе. Вот что я хотел сказать. Ну что ж... <See you again, have a nice day>."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não trate o amor como algo sobre lucros e perdas. É sobre {i:heart}.{n}É tudo o que eu quero dizer. Até mais, {i:see you again, have a nice day}."

Umineko Project (UP): Searching for each other's weaknesses, going after Grandfather's fortune, screw all that forever...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "Okay! We'll always be friendly and happy. Let's all believe in that."
Umineko Project (UP): "Alright! We'll always be friendly and happy. And let's all believe that."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Alright! We'll always be friendly and happy. And let's all believe that."
PC Japanese (JP): 「おう！　俺たちはみんないつまでも仲良しで幸せだ。それをみんなで信じようぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「おう！　俺たちはみんないつまでも仲良しで幸せだ。それをみんなで信じようぜ」

Vietnamese (VI): "Alright! We'll always be friendly and happy. And let's all believe that."

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Alright! We'll always be friendly and happy. And let's all believe that."

Steam (ST): No matter how much we cousins tried to nostalgically have fun, dark clouds continued to approach Rokkenjima.
Umineko Project (UP): No matter how long it had been, or how much fun we were having, it didn't stop the dark clouds from approaching Rokkenjima.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As all of us cousins were trying nostalgically to have fun, dark clouds approached Rokkenjima.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺たちいとこがどんなに楽しく懐かしく振舞おうと、六軒島には暗雲が近付いている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 俺たちいとこがどんなに楽しく懐かしく振舞おうと、六軒島には暗雲が近付いている。
Russian (RU): Пока мы ностальгировали и веселились, к Роккенджиме приблизились темные облака.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não importa quanto tempo passasse ou o quanto nos divertíssemos, isso não parou as escuras nuvens que se aproximavam de Rokkenjima.
Vietnamese (VI): No matter how long it had been, or how much fun we were having, it didn't stop the dark clouds from approaching Rokkenjima.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 無論我們幾個堂兄妹表現得有多快樂多依依不捨，烏雲都不會停止邁向六軒島的腳步。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 无论我们几个堂兄妹表现得有多快乐多依依不舍，乌云都不会停止迈向六轩岛的脚步。
Indonesian (IDN): No matter how long it had been, or how much fun we were having, it didn't stop the dark clouds from approaching Rokkenjima.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mentre tutti noi cugini stavamo nostalgicamente provando a divertirci, nuvole scure si avvicinavano a Rokkenjima.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): No matter how long it had been, or how much fun we were having, it didn't stop the dark clouds from approaching Rokkenjima.
Turkish (TR): Ne kadar uzun zaman geçerse geçsin ya da ne kadar eğlenirsek eğlenelim, bu durum kapkara bulutların Rokkenjima'ya yaklaşmasına engel olamadı.

Steam (ST): ...I wonder if the typhoon will pass and let us see the clear skies before we leave this island.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I wonder if the typhoon will pass and show us the refreshing sky before we leave this island.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......I wonder if the typhoon will pass and show us the refreshing sky before we leave this island.
PC Japanese (JP): ……俺たちがこの島を去る頃には、台風は通り過ぎ、清々しい空を見せてくれるだろうか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……俺たちがこの島を去る頃には、台風は通り過ぎ、清々しい空を見せてくれるだろうか。
Russian (RU): ......А вдруг тайфун пройдёт мимо и мы будем любоваться освежающим небом до тех пор, пока не покинем остров.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Me pergunto se o tufão vai passar por nós e nos mostrar um refrescante céu azul antes de deixarmos esta ilha.
Vietnamese (VI): ......I wonder if the typhoon will pass and show us the refreshing sky before we leave this island.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……在我們離開這座島時，能否看到台風過後的、晴朗清爽的天空呢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……在我们离开这座岛时，能否看到台风过后的、晴朗清爽的天空呢。
Indonesian (IDN): ......I wonder if the typhoon will pass and show us the refreshing sky before we leave this island.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Mi chiedo se il tifone passerà e ci mostrerà il cielo rinfrescante prima di andarcene dall'isola.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): ......I wonder if the typhoon will pass and show us the refreshing sky before we leave this island.
Turkish (TR): ......Acaba tayfun geçip gidecek ve biz bu adadan ayrılmadan önce bize ferahlatıcı gökyüzünü gösterecek mi?

Steam (ST): Who cares about what our parents are planning? Who cares about the inheritance and the honor of our old family?
Umineko Project (UP): Who gives a crap about what our parents are plotting?{n}Who gives a crap about the inheritance and the honor of our old family?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Who cares about what our parents expect? Who cares about the inheritance and the honor of our old family?
PC Japanese (JP): 親たちの思惑なんか知ったことか。遺産も旧家とやらの面子も知ったことじゃない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 親たちの思惑なんか知ったことか。{n}遺産も旧家とやらの面子も知ったことじゃない。
Russian (RU): Кого волнуют ожидания наших родителей?{n}Кому сдались это наследство и честь старой семьи?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quem se importa com o que os nossos pais estão planejando?{n}Quem se importa com a herança e a honra da nossa antiga família?
Vietnamese (VI): Who gives a crap about what our parents are plotting?{n}Who gives a crap about the inheritance and the honor of our old family?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我才不管大人們在打什麼算盤。{n}遺產也好名門的面子也好，與我何干。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我才不管大人们在打什么算盘。{n}遗产也好名门的面子也好，与我何干。
Indonesian (IDN): Who gives a crap about what our parents are plotting?{n}Who gives a crap about the inheritance and the honor of our old family?
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Chi se ne importa di cosa si aspettano i nostri parenti. Chi se ne importa dell'eredità e dell'onore della nostra vecchia famiglia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Who gives a crap about what our parents are plotting?{n}Who gives a crap about the inheritance and the honor of our old family?
Turkish (TR): Ailelerimizin ne dolaplar çevirdiği kimin umrunda?{n}Yaşlı ailemizin mirası ve onuru kimin umrunda?

Steam (ST): As youthful as we were, we were renewing our old friendship. And we all believed together that we could find happiness.
Umineko Project (UP): We're so young, and renewing our old friendship.{n}And every one of us believes together that we can all be happy.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As youthful as we were, we were renewing our old friendship. And we all believed together that we could all be happy.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺たちはこんなにも青春し、旧交を温めあっているんだ。そして、みんながみんな、幸せになれると信じ合ってる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 俺たちはこんなにも青春し、旧交を温めあっているんだ。{n}そして、みんながみんな、幸せになれると信じ合ってる。
Russian (RU): И хоть мы были юны, мы обновляли нашу старую дружбу.{n}Все мы верили, что сможем быть счастливы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós somos tão jovens, e renovamos nossa antiga amizade.{n}E cada um de nós acredita que juntos podemos todos ser felizes.
Vietnamese (VI): We're so young, and renewing our old friendship.{n}And every one of us believes together that we can all be happy.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們是如此的年少青春，重溫著舊交。{n}並且，我們每一個人都相信，能夠獲得幸福。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我们是如此的年少青春，重温着旧交。{n}并且，我们每一个人都相信，能够获得幸福。
Indonesian (IDN): We're so young, and renewing our old friendship.{n}And every one of us believes together that we can all be happy.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Giovani com'eravamo, stavamo rinnovando la nostra vecchia amicizia. E tutti assieme credevamo di poter essere felici.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): We're so young, and renewing our old friendship.{n}And every one of us believes together that we can all be happy.
Turkish (TR): Daha çok genciz ve eski dostluklarımızı tazeliyoruz.{n}Ve her birimiz hep birlikte mutlu olabileceğimize inanıyoruz.

Steam (ST): So... I want this pair of days to end... without anything weird happening, in peace and happiness... and calmly...
Umineko Project (UP): So...I want this day to end, without anything weird occurring, in peace and happiness, calmly...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Therefore..., I wanted this day to end, without anything weird occurring, in peace and happiness, calmly...

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だから…、何もおかしなことは起こらず、平和に幸せに、穏やかに、今日と明日が終わって欲しい…。
Russian (RU): Поэтому... мне хотелось, чтобы этот день завершился... без всяких странных происшествий... мирно, счастливо... и спокойно...

Vietnamese (VI): So...I want this day to end, without anything weird occurring, in peace and happiness, calmly...

Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以…，我希望能不发生任何事，平安、幸福、平静地，…结束今明两天。
Indonesian (IDN): So...I want this day to end, without anything weird occurring, in peace and happiness, calmly...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò... volevo che questo giorno finisse, senza che accadesse nulla di strano, in pace e felicità, con calma...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): So...I want this day to end, without anything weird occurring, in peace and happiness, calmly...
Turkish (TR): Bu yüzden...Bu günün...garip bir şey olmadan, huzur ve mutluluk içinde, sakin bir şekilde, bitmesini istiyorum...

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): Come, let us begin this tale of tragedy! Come to me, winds, rain, typhoon! Cut this island off from the real world!! Throw Rokkenjima into another realm, into the spirit world, into a world of fantasy!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Come, let us begin this tale of tragedy! Come to me, rain, winds, typhoon! Cut this island off from the real world!! Throw Rokkenjima into another world, into the netherworld, into a world of fantasy!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Come, let us begin this tale of tragedy! Come to me, winds, rain, typhoon! Cut this island off from the real world!! Throw Rokkenjima into another world, into the spirit world, into a world of fantasy!"
PC Japanese (JP): さぁさ、始めようではないか、惨劇の物語を！　訪れよ、雨よ風よ台風よ！　この島を現世より切り離せッ！！　異界へ魔界へ幻想界へ、六軒島を放り込めッ！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さぁさ、始めようではないか、惨劇の物語を！　訪れよ、雨よ風よ台風よ！　この島を現世より切り離せッ！！　異界へ魔界へ幻想界へ、六軒島を放り込めッ！」
Russian (RU): "Ну что ж, давай начнём эту трагическую историю! Ко мне, ветра, дожди, ураганы! Отрежьте этот остров от реального мира! Ввергните Роккенджиму в иной мир, в мир духов, в мир сказки!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Anda, vamos começar o novo conto desta tragédia! Venham para mim, chuva, ventos, tufão! Desconectem esta ilha do mundo real!! Joguem Rokkenjima em um outro mundo, no mundo dos espíritos, no mundo da fantasia!"
Vietnamese (VI): "Come, let us begin this tale of tragedy! Come to me, rain, winds, typhoon! Cut this island off from the real world!! Throw Rokkenjima into another world, into the netherworld, into a world of fantasy!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「來——來，就此開始吧，開始這出慘劇故事！到來吧，雨喲風喲台風喲！將這座島切離現世！！將六軒島丟進異界、魔界、幻想界！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「来——来，就此开始吧，开始这出惨剧故事！到来吧，雨哟风哟台风哟！将这座岛切离现世！！将六轩岛丢进异界、魔界、幻想界！！」

Steam (ST): She didn't know what to do with her irritation at not being able to find something that should've been there, and, moaning bitterly, she couldn't help but keep going back and forth in circles around the same spot.
Umineko Project (UP): She didn't know what to do with her irritation at not being able to find something which should have been there, and, moaning bitterly, she couldn't help but keep going back and forth in circles around the same spot.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She didn't know what to do with her irritation at not being able to find something which should have been there, and, moaning bitterly, she couldn't help but keep going back and forth in circles around the same spot.
PC Japanese (JP): あるはずのものが見付からない苛立ちは、どこにもぶつけることができず、ただ恨めしく唸りながら、うろうろと同じ場所を行ったり来たりするしかない。

Russian (RU): Она не знала, что делать с раздражением, вызванным фактом того, что она не могла разыскать нечто, чему полагалось быть там, и, горько постанывая, только и могла, что ходить кругами взад‐вперёд вокруг одного и того же места.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela não sabia o que fazer com sua irritação por não ser capaz de encontrar algo que supostamente deveria estar lá, e, gemendo amargamente, ela não pôde fazer mais nada além de continuar a procurar de um lado ao outro, em volta do mesmo lugar.
Vietnamese (VI): She didn't know what to do with her irritation at not being able to find something which should have been there, and, moaning bitterly, she couldn't help but keep going back and forth in circles around the same spot.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 無處宣泄找不到應有之物的郁悶的她，只能邊一肚子怨氣地念叨著，邊在同樣的地方轉來轉去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 无处宣泄找不到应有之物的郁闷的她，只能边一肚子怨气地念叨着，边在同样的地方转来转去。
Indonesian (IDN): She didn't know what to do with her irritation at not being able to find something which should have been there, and, moaning bitterly, she couldn't help but keep going back and forth in circles around the same spot.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non sapeva cosa fare, con la sua irritazione per non essere in grado di trovare qualcosa che avrebbe dovuto essere lì, e, gemendo amaramente, non poteva far altro che continuare ad andare avanti e indietro in tondo attorno allo stesso punto.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): She didn't know what to do with her irritation at not being able to find something which should have been there, and, moaning bitterly, she couldn't help but keep going back and forth in circles around the same spot.

Steam (ST): She was acting almost as though she'd be able to see it if she looked at a different angle, but even though she did that, there was no way to find something that wasn't there...
Umineko Project (UP): She was acting almost as though she would be able to see it if she looked at a different angle, but try as she might, there was no way she would find something that wasn't there...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She was acting almost as though she would be able to see it if she looked at a different angle, but even though she did that, there was no way to find something that wasn't there...

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "So, Kinzo, I've come to join in on your fun once more... My preparations are already complete. What of you? Have you prepared enough coins to bet in tonight's game...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "So, Kinzo. I've come to join in on your fun once again... My preparations are already complete. What about you? I assume you have prepared enough coins to bet in tonight's game...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "So, Kinzo. I've come to join in on your fun once again... My preparations are already complete. What about you? Have you prepared enough coins to bet in tonight's game...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「さぁて、金蔵。そなたの遊びに再び付き合いに来たぞ…。妾の準備はすでに万端よ。そなたの方はどうなのか？　今宵のゲームに賭けるコインの用意は充分であろうな…？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さぁて、金蔵。そなたの遊びに再び付き合いに来たぞ…。妾の準備はすでに万端よ。そなたの方はどうなのか？　今宵のゲームに賭けるコインの用意は充分であろうな…？」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pois bem, Kinzo. Eu vim para me juntar à sua diversão mais uma vez... Meus preparativos já estão completos. E quanto a você? Eu assumo que tenha preparado moedas o bastante para apostar no jogo desta noite...?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哼哼，金藏。妾身来再次陪汝玩汝的游戏了哦…。妾身早已做好万全的准备。汝那边又如何呢？有将赌于今宵游戏中的硬币，准备充足吧…？」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Allora, Kinzo. Sono venuta per unirmi ai tuoi divertimenti ancora una volta... {n}I miei preparativi sono già finiti. E i tuoi? Hai preparato abbastanza monete da scommettere nel gioco di stanotte...?"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "So, Kinzo. I've come to join in on your fun once again... My preparations are already complete. What about you? I assume you have prepared enough coins to bet in tonight's game...?"

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "Ronove, is it? ...It's been quite some time. It seems you have remembered me. You were always a man who took loyalty seriously."
Umineko Project (UP): "Ronove, is it. ......It's been quite some time. It seems that you have remembered me. You always were a man who was serious about loyalty."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ronove, is it. ......It's been quite some time. It seems that you have remembered me. You were always a man who was serious about loyalty."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ロノウェか。……ずいぶん久し振りになるな。妾のことを覚えておったとは。そなたはつくづく忠義に厚い男よ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ロノウェか。……ずいぶん久し振りになるな。妾のことを覚えておったとは。そなたはつくづく忠義に厚い男よ」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ronove... ......Já faz um certo tempo. Parece que lembrou de mim? Você sempre foi um homem sério quanto à lealdade."
Vietnamese (VI): "Ronove, is it. ......It's been quite some time. It seems that you have remembered me. You always were a man who was serious about loyalty."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是羅諾威啊。……是有相當長一段時間沒見了呢。還記得妾身呀。汝倒真是個重忠義的男人呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是罗诺威啊。……是有相当长一段时间没见了呢。还记得妾身呀。汝倒真是个重忠义的男人呢。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Ronove, is it. ......It's been quite some time. It seems that you have remembered me. You always were a man who was serious about loyalty."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ronove, eh. ... È passato del tempo. Sembra che ti sia ricordato di me. {n}Sei sempre stato un uomo che prendeva seriamente la lealtà."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Ronove, is it. ......It's been quite some time. It seems that you have remembered me. You always were a man who was serious about loyalty."
Turkish (TR): "Ronove, demek. ......Epey zaman oldu. Görünüşe göre beni hatırlamışsın. Sen her zaman sadakat konusunda ciddi bir adamdın."

Speaker: Ronove
Steam (ST): "It has been quite some time since your last correspondence... Not for a single day have I, Ronove, forgotten that I serve you, Milady.
Umineko Project (UP): "It has been a very long time since you last corresponded... There has not been a single day that I, Ronove, have forgotten that I serve you, Milady."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It has been a very long time since you last corresponded... There hasn't been a single day that I, Ronove, have forgotten that I serve you, Milady.
PC Japanese (JP): 「長いご無沙汰を頂戴しておりました…。このロノウェ、お嬢様にお仕えしていることを忘れた日など、ただの一日もございませんよ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「長いご無沙汰を頂戴しておりました…。このロノウェ、お嬢様にお仕えしていることを忘れた日など、ただの一日もございませんよ」
Russian (RU): "Прошло много времени с тех пор, как вы последний раз связывались со мной... Но не было ни одного дня, чтобы я, Ронове, забыл, что состою у вас на службе, миледи."

Vietnamese (VI): "It has been a very long time since you last corresponded... There has not been a single day that I, Ronove, have forgotten that I serve you, Milady."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是有好久未與小姐相見了呢…。我羅諾威，從未在哪一天，忘記過自己是仕奉小姐之身。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是有好久未与小姐相见了呢…。我罗诺威，从未在哪一天，忘记过自己是仕奉小姐之身。」
Indonesian (IDN): "It has been a very long time since you last corresponded... There has not been a single day that I, Ronove, have forgotten that I serve you, Milady."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È passato davvero molto tempo dall'ultima volta che mi ha scritto una lettera... non c'è stato un singolo giorno che io, Ronove, abbia dimenticato di servirla, Milady.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "It has been a very long time since you last corresponded... There has not been a single day that I, Ronove, have forgotten that I serve you, Milady."
Turkish (TR): "Son yazışmanızdan bu yana çok uzun zaman geçti. Benim, Ronove'nin, size hizmet ettiğimi unuttuğum tek bir gün bile olmadı, Leydim."

Speaker: Ronove
Steam (ST): I was more afraid that you had forgotten about me. After all, you can be quite forgetful."
Umineko Project (UP): "Indeed, I was more fearful that you had forgotten about me, Milady. I have, after all, known you to be quite forgetful."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I was more fearful that Milady had forgotten about me. In any event, Milady is quite forgetful."
PC Japanese (JP): それよりも、お嬢様にこそ、私をお忘れになられたのではないかと、冷や冷やしておりました。何しろ、お嬢様は大層忘れっぽくていらっしゃいますので。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それよりも、お嬢様にこそ、私をお忘れになられたのではないかと、冷や冷やしておりました。何しろ、お嬢様は大層忘れっぽくていらっしゃいますので」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "De fato, eu estava com mais receio que você tivesse esquecido de mim. Afinal, pelo que conheço, você é bem esquecida."

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「比起這個，我倒是一直忐忑不安地擔心著，小姐會不會把我給忘了呢。畢竟，小姐您甚是健忘啊。」

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Indeed, I was more fearful that you had forgotten about me, Milady. I have, after all, known you to be quite forgetful."
Turkish (TR): "Doğrusu, daha çok beni unutmuş olmanızdan korkuyordum, Leydim. Ne de olsa, sizin oldukça unutkan olduğunuzu biliyorum."

Steam (ST): In the beginning, the adults had all doubted the credibility of the letter, but after realizing that this was a once-in-a-lifetime chance in the inheritance struggle for the three younger siblings, Eva changed her position, claiming that the letter was authentic.
Umineko Project (UP): In the beginning, the adults had all doubted the authenticity of the letter, but after just now realizing that this was a once‐in‐a‐lifetime chance for the three siblings other than Krauss in the struggle for the inheritance, Eva had changed her position, and had claimed that the letter was authentic.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In the beginning, the adults had all doubted the credibility of the letter, but after just now realizing that this was a once-in-a-lifetime chance for the three siblings other than Krauss in the struggle for the inheritance, Eva had changed her position, and had claimed that the letter was authentic.
PC Japanese (JP): 当初こそ手紙の信憑性について疑いあった大人たちだったが、当主継承争いは蔵臼以外の３人にとって無二のチャンスになることを理解した途端に、絵羽は口調を換え、手紙の正当性を主張し出した。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 当初こそ手紙の信憑性について疑いあった大人たちだったが、当主継承争いは蔵臼以外の３人にとって無二のチャンスになることを理解した途端に、絵羽は口調を変え、手紙の正当性を主張し出した。
